text: Samuel David Moore (October 12, 1935 â€“ January 10, 2025) was an American singer. He was best known as a member of the soul and R&B; duo Sam & Dave from 1961 to 1981. He was a member of the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame. His best known single was "Soul Man". He was also honored into the National Rhythm & Blues Hall of Fame. Moore died at a hospital in Coral Gables, Florida, on January 10, 2025 from problems caused by surgery at the age of 89. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official web site * Sam Moore Interview at NAMM Oral History Library (2022) * Joyce Moore Interview at NAMM Oral History Library (2022) * * Category:1935 births Category:2025 deaths Category:American singer- songwriters Category:American R&B; singers Category:American soul singers Category:Singers from Miami Category:Writers from Miami Category:Deaths from surgical complications
title: Sam Moore
